sentences.en: It was now his turn to misjudge his opponent.
sentences.cn: 现在轮到他低估自己的对手了。

sentences.en: This is particularly important for men, who are more inclined to misjudge situations.
sentences.cn: 这对男人来说尤为重要，因为他们经常错误的判断情况。

sentences.en: People who suffer panic disorders may misjudge threats, seeing them as far more imminent than they really are.
sentences.cn: 而忍受焦虑症的人会误判威胁，认为危险比实际更为迫近。
